sourcesContent:
const ProductsForm = ({ setProductName, setProductQuantity, setProductCategory, setProductPhoto, setProductPrice, setProductDate, productName, productQuantity, productCategory, productPhoto, productPrice, productDate, date, }) => { const formatDate = (dateString) => { const date = new Date(dateString); const year = date.getFullYear(); const month = String(date.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, "0"); const day = String(date.getDate()).padStart(2, "0"); return `${year}-${month}-${day}`; }; return ( <>
setProductName(e.target.value)} />
setProductQuantity(e.target.value)} />
setProductPhoto(e.target.files[0])} />
setProductPrice(e.target.value)} />
setProductDate(new Date(e.target.value).toISOString().split("T")[0]) } value={date ? formatDate(date) : null} />
); }; export default ProductsForm;
